canvas_summaries.ocr_text: Ontbil128 Equal Pay for Equal Work. DO YOU REALISE THAT A Woman Teacher receives only four- fifths of a Man Teacher' s salary? Women Teachers receive the same training, work for the same certificates and have the same professional responsibilities as Men Teachers? Women Teachers pay as much for food, lodg ings, fares, books, holiday accommodation, and other general expenses as Men Teachers? DO YOU BELIEVE THAT Teachers should receive salaries based not on sex but on qualifications and experience as is the case with Doctors, Journalists, Lawyers, Members of Parliament, Cabinet Ministers and Parliamentary Secretaries? WILL YOU WORK with other Women Teachers to secure the es tablishment of equal pay for equal work in the teaching profession? IF SO Join the National Union of Women Teachers, the only teachers' organisation which is working to secure equal pay for equal work. Write for particulars to: THE GENERAL SECRETARY, 41 CROMWELL ROAD, S. W. 7.
